import React,{useState} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from "./Rating" function SingleBooking() { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const [ratingValue, setRatingValue] = useState(0); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}); const {id} = useParams() function handleChange(e) { const name = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); } return (
{showModal ? (

) : null}
) } export default SingleBooking
